Welcome to Policing and Public Safety

Victim support

Victim Support Merseyside helps
effects of crime. They do this by
information to victims of crime and to
Being a victim of a crime can be both confusing and frightening – the Victim Support Directory can offer victims advice and support. You can download this below.
The directory covers the following crime areas:
Crime can affect anybody. The information available within this support directory can signpost you to relevant agencies that can help you immediately.
For further information about victim support in the Merseyside area visit the Victim Support Merseyside website (see below) or use the contact details at the bottom of this page.
